item.description:
Meetup venue has changed for this Thursday. Instead of our regular meeting place and format at Positive image we will be attending a cocktail party/fashion show/ lecture at Design Within Reach (DWR) in the south end.

519 Tremont Street Boston
Phone: 617.451.7801
Fax: 617.451.7805
www.dwr.com/dwrstudio.cfm?loc_id=38

This will be a great place to have fun and network since it will be heavily attended by fashion industry members. We will also hear from a Newbury Street boutique owner and have a chance to meet her. Plus we get cocktails and hors devours. Parking is available in the garage under DWR. The nearest T stop is the Back Bay station (orange line).


Scandinavian Style with Stil, Inc.
Thursday, September 21, 7?9pm

Find out what?s new for Fall fashion out of Denmark with an evening of style from Boston boutique Stil, Inc. Stil owner Betty Riaz will discuss how Copenhagen has become a huge influence in the fashion and design world, touching on some of the notable Danish designers ? such as Arne Jacobsen and Eva Solo. A fashion show will feature new pieces for the season from designers Malene Birger, Bruuns Bazaar, Suzanne Rutzo, Heartmade, Baum and Pfertgarten, Darhling and Noir. Hair styling will be provided Acote Salon on Newbury Street. Attendees will receive goody bags filled with coupons and fun products from Stil Clothing. Cocktails and music from DJ?me will kick off the evening at 6pm.





Please make sure you give us your profile as you RSVP especially if you are an older member before we now require members to apply and be accepted. It is very important in order to classify you according to your fashion products, servives or even your aspirations and explorations, and to properly set up our Meetups. There are many people looking for fashion people in all aspects of the industry. Let them know what you do so they can find you in our Network Database.

For more information, see http://www.shirleywil...
item.name: The Boston Fashion Industry September Meetup
